name: 17mm Balljoint Extenders
description:
These fit any VW platform that uses the 17mm Ball joint. Golf MK1, Polo MK1 etc..

Using these allows the wishbone to sit at a better angle when the car is lowered, thus improving handling. Alongside this modification we recommend running a tie-rod flip. Please see our other products for sale for these parts.

Precision machined from EN24 steel billet.

"Show use only"

Price is per pair.

name: 80mm Drop Plates
description:
These bolt onto your beam between the beam and stub axle and give you 80mm drop when using any suspension!

Using these has two main benefits:
1. Your suspension effectively gains 80mm travel (compared to lowering your car by winding the coil over down). This means that the shock is a more optimum position leaving your ride less crashy- and more how the manufacturer intended!

2. When you lower a car with a torsion-swing beam, the wheel naturally begins to swing forward and hug the front edge of the arch. Using these drop plates puts the wheel back to where it's supposed to be - the centre of the arch. This means you can actually lower your car more because the wheel catches the arch later - giving you a bit more space.

3. These space the stub axle out 12mm. Meaning the wheel fills the arch more - eliminating the need for spacers. 

Specification:
80mm Drop
12mm Spacing

To fit: 
Golf/Jetta/Vento 75-98
Golf cabrio 79-98
Passat 74-97
Polo 75-00
Polo classic 96-00
Scirocco 74-92

Audi 50 75-78
Audi 80/90/Avant 73-92
Audi Coupe 81-88

97-03 Arosa
93-99 Cordoba
93-99 Ibiza
92-99 Toledo

This product has been tufftrided for protection.

We will be adding more photos soon.

Come with four bolts and washer, and two drop plates.

These are for 'show use only'.

name: Track rod flip kit
description:
Using these parts enables the user to flip their track rods so that they match the angle of the wishbones to reduce bump steer. 

By machining/drilling a 17mm hole in your hub to remove the taper that the track rod normal fits into - you are able to press this into the hub and mount the track rod on the other side of the hub.

name: 19mm Ball Joint Extenders
description:
These fit any VW platform that uses the 19mm Ball joint. 

Using these allows the wishbone to sit at a better angle when the car is lowered, thus improving handling. Alongside this modification we recommend running a tie-rod flip. Please see our other products for sale for these parts.

Precision machined from EN24 steel billet. 

Price is per pair.

These will not fit VR6 ball joints, they fit the pinch bolt type.

name: Billet MK2/MK3/Corrado Top Mounts
description:
These are custom made, CNC machined.

They replace the top half of your top mount, to clean up the bay. 

They have a small magnet on the underside of the centre cap. That allows you to remove it easily using a magnet. 

You will get a set. Two caps, two topmounts.

As seen on many show cars!
